argument.name: dimension
argument.description: Default value is 1. The index of the array dimension. Used to get the size of each dimension in a multidimensional array.

return.name: Size
return.description: Returns the size of the array.

page.description: Return the extent of the array optional dimension for multidimensional arrays.
page.discussion: The *[xb:<array>.size()]* method returns size of an array.

section.title: Examples
section.description: The following shows how to get the size of a multi-dimensional array.
section.example:
dim xa[3,5] as C
? xa.size(1) = 3
? xa.size(2) = 5
? xa.dimensions() = 2
